summary: This is an email from Linda Singer regarding a call with the DOJ about the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The email contains a standard attorney-client privilege and confidentiality notice, indicating it is likely legal correspondence between attorneys or between an attorney and client.

persons.name: Linda Singer
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email discussing a call with the DOJ regarding the SDNY Epstein investigation. The email includes a confidentiality notice typical of legal correspondence.

events.title: Call with DOJ re: Epstein SDNY Investigation
events.description: A call took place between Linda Singer and the Department of Justice regarding the Southern District of New York's investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An attorney, Linda Singer, communicated about a call with the DOJ concerning the SDNY Epstein investigation on October 5, 2020.
The communication is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege and work product protection.
The document indicates ongoing legal or investigative activity related to the Epstein case in late 2020.
